omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
;with 
    XMLNAMESPACES('http://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/messages/COSD-v9-0-1' AS COSD901),
    CosdRecords as ( 

    select
            T.staging.value('(Id/@root)[1]', 'uniqueidentifier') as Id,
            T.staging.query('.') as Node
    from omop_staging.cosd_staging
    cross apply content.nodes('COSD901:COSD/*') as T(staging)
    where T.staging.exist('Id/@root') = 1
            and Content.value('namespace-uri((/*:COSD)[1])','nvarchar(max)') = 'http://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/messages/COSD-v9-0-1'
            and substring (FileName, 15, 2) = 'CO'
), CO as (
	select
		Id,
		Node,
		Node.value('(ColorectalRecord/LinkagePatientId/NhsNumber/@extension)[1]', 'varchar(max)') as NhsNumber,
		Node.value('(ColorectalRecord/NonPrimaryPathway/DateOfNonPrimaryCancerDiagnosisClinicallyAgreed)[1]', 'varchar(max)') as DateOfNonPrimaryCancerDiagnosisClinicallyAgreed,
		Node.value('(ColorectalRecord/NonPrimaryPathway/Recurrence/OriginalPrimaryDiagnosisIcd/@code)[1]', 'varchar(max)') as NonPrimaryRecurrenceOriginalDiagnosis
	from CosdRecords
)
select 
	distinct 
        NhsNumber,
        DateOfNonPrimaryCancerDiagnosisClinicallyAgreed,
		NonPrimaryRecurrenceOriginalDiagnosis
from CO
where NonPrimaryRecurrenceOriginalDiagnosis is not null;

omopColumns.name: condition_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Resolve ICD10 codes to OMOP concepts. If code cannot be mapped, map using the parent code.

dataSource.name: NonPrimaryRecurrenceOriginalDiagnosis
dataSource.description: PRIMARY DIAGNOSIS (ICD ORIGINAL) is the International Classification of Diseases (ICD) code used to identify the original PRIMARY DIAGNOSIS.

omopColumns.name: condition_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Converts ICD10/OPCS4 concepts to SNOMED concepts.

omopColumns.name: condition_start_date

dataSource.name: DateOfNonPrimaryCancerDiagnosisClinicallyAgreed
dataSource.description: DATE OF NON PRIMARY CANCER DIAGNOSIS (CLINICALLY AGREED) is the date where the Non Primary Cancer PATIENT DIAGNOSIS was confirmed or agreed.

origins.origin: DATE OF NON PRIMARY CANCER DIAGNOSIS (CLINICALLY AGREED)

omopColumns.name: condition_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32828`. `EHR episode record`
